Text: Lindoffs, though I sigh at the nonexistence of eng-subs in your torrents, I can't help appreciating your work. thanks a lot, pal..

@devrimCHE: 
We are a Swedish release group, if you have special request you find me on I-net.
thanks, Scratzz. I'll do that. let me, however, say the most urgent ones here: marat/sade 1967; and mephisto 1981 (with eng-subs, of course.) thanks, anyway

I also appreciate your work, but hate false advertising! I was very disappointed to dload a Kurosawa u have upped with a clear description of EN subs present, only to discover, after completion and seeding, that there were none present... Not cool, my friend, not cool at all! 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6760201/Hakuchi_%28The_Idiot%29_%5B1951_PAL_DVD%5D%5BJa_Subs%5BNordic_En%5D

So keep up the good work, thanx for uploading, but please provide accurate description, man!
